Name: Brood Lord

Traits.Name: Monstrosity
Traits.Description: Takes 1 turn after every player character turn. If slow, only one of its turns is affected.

Traits.Name: Colossus
Traits.Description: Has phasing for characters and terrain smaller than it and can end turn in those spaces. Ignores engagement from smaller characters. Ignores movement penalties for terrain.

Traits.Name: Shelter
Traits.Description: Adjacent allies get +1 accuracy on saves.

Traits.Name: Brood Minions
Traits.Description:
The Brood Lord creates unique summons with its abilities. It can summon any combination of the following minions, which all have defense 7+chapter and 1 hp by default. They can move 3 spaces when the Brood Lord takes their turn, otherwise cannot take actions by themselves unless specified.
• Clawing Brood: Foes treat spaces adjacent clawing brood as engagement.
• Grappler Brood: Characters that start their turn next to an Grappler brood must save or be shoved 2 in a direction of the Brood Lord’s choice.
• Crusher Brood: 1/1/2 armor. Characters that start their turn adjacent to 1 or more crusher brood must save or become dazed, winded, or staggered (Brood Lord’s choice).

SetupTraits.Name: Legion
SetupTraits.Description: The Broodlord starts combat with 5 of its unique summons per player character, which can be placed in any space on the battlefield not within range 2 of players.

Actions.Name: Autocure
Actions.Description: May grant vigor 1 to a bloodied ally in range 3.

Actions.Name: Juggernaut
Actions.Description: At the start of its turn, can save against all statuses and marks and clear all blights as a free action.

BodyParts.Name: Brood Control
BodyParts.Description: Brood can only move 1 space instead of 3, and brood assault becomes 1 action.

BodyParts.Name: Spines
BodyParts.Description: Shadow spines lose pierce and become line 3.

BodyParts.Name: Possession Gem
BodyParts.Description: Possession costs 2 actions. Characters can sell a possession gem for 4 dust.

PhasesDescription: The Brood Lord can switch phases at the start of each round. It can be forced to switch phases if it loses all its minions, in which case it happens instantly. It can start in either phase.

Traits.Name: Lurk
Traits.Description: The Brood Lord is intangible in this phase and cannot summon new minions. If all its summons are destroyed, it is immediately forced into phase 2.

Traits.Name: Looming Shadow
Traits.Description: The Brood Lord’s space is difficult terrain for hostile characters and allied characters spend 0 movement to cross spaces in the area.

Actions.Name: Brood Assault
Actions.Description: Up to 2 brood minions make a melee attack, using the brood lord’s attack bonus.
Actions.Hit: Deal light damage. Gain pierce if two other brood are adjacent to the target.

Actions.Name: Shadow Spines
Actions.AreaEffect: Piercing fray damage. Allies are immune.

Actions.Name: Great Puppeteer
Actions.Description: Up to three allies in range of the Brood Lord can dash 4.

Actions.Name: Possess
Actions.Description: An allied character or summon in range 10 of the Brood Lord gains +1 action, +1 boon on attacks and saves, and vigor 1 (using the brood lord’s health). Can only possess one character at once.

Actions.Name: Evolve Brood
Actions.Description: Destroy one brood summon and replace it with an Impaler, Sledge, or Skulk. This new unit has the summon type and only 25% max hp.

Actions.Name: Spawn
Actions.Description: The Brood Lord spawns new unique minions per character in any space on the battlefield that’s not in range 2 of a player character.

Actions.Name: Brood Assault
Actions.Description: Up to 2 brood minions make a melee attack, using the brood lord’s attack bonus.
Actions.Hit: Deal light damage. Gain pierce if two other brood are adjacent to the target.

Actions.Name: Shadow Spines
Actions.AreaEffect: Piercing fray damage. Allies are immune.

Actions.Name: Great Puppeteer
Actions.Description: Up to three allies in range of the Brood Lord can dash 4.

Actions.Name: Possess
Actions.Description: An allied character or summon in range 10 of the Brood Lord gains +1 action, +1 boon on attacks and saves, and vigor 1 (using the brood lord’s health). Can only possess one character at once.

Actions.Name: Screaming Spire
Actions.Description: The Brood Lord summons a height 1 terrain piece in any free space not adjacent to a player character. Foes in range 2 of the spire take boosted and godly damage from summons, and allied summons have dodge in the same area. Attacks automatically hit the spire, and it is destroyed after taking 10 damage. The Brood Lord can only create one spire at once.
